start.text: I hope there's no idiots who sit around like ducks in my crew.
Don't be stuffy, crew. Just stand straight!
We have to get started, so buckle up.
We're not gonna let em' through so easily.

start_boss.text: You won't get anything done if you sit there and keep saying you're scared!

retreat.text: Retreating. Sorry, I wasn't too helpful there...

out_of_missiles.text: We're out of missiles! I told you to be patient with those!
Damn it, we're out of missiles.
Out of missiles. We can still fight.

engaged.text: We'll be able to end this smoothly if we keep this up.

need_help.text: Not going to give up. We can still fight.

pursuing.text: Got you! Shouldn't have gotten cocky.
We've got them on the run!
That's as far as you're gonna get with those skills.

running.text: We've got incoming. Get us away, helm!
Pulling back, don't wanna get reckless...
They got us on the ropes for a second...

hull_90.text: We're taking hits, don't expect us to stop here.
This isn't the time to be discouraged. Get a move on, all of you!
Armor's taking hits. We'll win this for sure.

hull_50.text: Fire's no problem. ...I can still fight.
Can't let everyone die here... We need to think of a way out.
They got some of the hull. They won't have it their way any more.

hull_30.text: It's not over yet. We'll win this.
We're taking a lot of heat. I won't give up just yet.

overload.text: I told you! You shouldn't have let the flux get so high!
No problem. We'll be back in the fight in just a moment.
Overloaded. That won't discourage us forever.

death.text: This'll end up taking a toll on the guys behind me...

victory.text: See, actions speak louder than words.
Thanks, all. You did a pretty good job this time.

victory_boss.text: It was obvious we'd win. Thought we couldn't handle this much?
